name: SHIP.ME
description:
After getting promoted to a management role in the shipping department for the starbase LRX47, it is up to you to carefully handle the shipping of products across the empire...

JAM LINK: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/shipme-starbase-shipping-simulation-1

Music, SFX, Font, 3D Models, 2D art - all made from scratch for the jam.

Credit to:
Music by GreyScreen (Kevin Stebner)
http://greyscreen.bandcamp.com
